title: Need somemore blue essence and RP!
body: We need more rewards!! very hard for us to earn Blue Essence and RP, Plus, skins, icons, emotes...too expensive. Since 2020 year of Plague, disasters, chaos all around us, 50% discount for all things. Agreed? we are not Greedy...{{champion:555}}

replies.body:
1. At no point has RP been earnable, so that's never gonna happen
2. Although it takes longer to get, there is more BE overall than there was IP back in the day
3. Riot don't do discounts (beyond the weekly sales) unless its a special event (Such as Lunar New Year, Harrowing etc.)
